metadata.title: CVE-2023-37304 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the DoubleWiki extension for MediaWiki through1.39.3. includes/DoubleWiki.php allows XSS via the column alignmentfeature.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
